translated: Great Escape (called The Great Escape & Splashwater Kingdom until January 2012) is a theme park managed by the company Six Flags is located in Queensbury, NY, United States.
original: Great Escape (appelé The Great Escape & Splashwater Kingdom jusqu'en janvier 2012) est un parc d'attractions géré par la firme Six Flags, situé à Queensbury, NY, États-Unis.
